        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="78574" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="78574" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.83</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2596">2,596</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="526"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Valaya</b> by <b>Parfums de Marly</b> is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Valaya</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Aldehydes, White Peach, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Petalia, Lily-of-the-Valley, Nympheal, Vetiver and Mahonia; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan, Akigalawood and Vanilla. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>A luminous aura and at the same time an intangible softness.Like the scent of fresh cotton, <strong>Valaya </strong>unfolds a sensual fragrance nuance dedicated to the power of femininity.</p>

<p>Beyond the artificial and beyond time, it awakens an intimate feeling, a universal emotion, a deep breath of mindfulness. Its formula evokes the delicate and pure skin of a woman in all its beauty.</p>

<p>One of the biggest challenges was to create a fragrance that is fresh and delicate, but at the same time very powerful and expressive.<strong>Valaya </strong>is reminiscent of the feel of cotton against the skin.A cocoon-like perfume that is sensual and elegant at the same time.A white perfume full of contrasts that is delicate yet incredibly alluring.  <em>Julien Sprecher</em> <em>(brand creator)</em></p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">128</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Poor performance for the price
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    Some dislike for Kilian Love

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371828" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lesleyswishes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lesleyswishes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78574.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valaya"title="Valaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250008">Lesleyswishes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733421008" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am so surprised at some of these reviewers who hate this perfume. To me, it smells like something I could keep sniffing 24/7. It is my signature scent and I love it. I guess this really highlights how personal tastes are regarding scent.  The notes are bright and clean and my mood is actually improved when I wear it. I work in a school, so I am conscious about what I may smell like to other people. I wear this very sparingly at work so that I am the only one smelling it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2371828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2371828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370490" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370490" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kcscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1337937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kcscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337937">kcscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733324831" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like fresh laundry that's been drying in the sun, and while that may sound basic, I have yet to find a fresh scent that I love as much as this one. I picture a beautiful woman coming from an old-money type of family, riding on the back of a brown horse through a hedge-covered park area, wearing this. The lasting power is insane, and so is the sillage, especially for a fresh scent. The price is outrageous. I don't think you should ever pay that much for a perfume, yet I'm considering it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2370490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2370490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If youve ever smelled a basketball, thats what this smells like. Straight up rubber. Hard pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2369556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2369556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362787" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mare_crisium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mare_crisium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); It's not your typical 'girly' inoffensive Glade fragrance. Reminds me slightly of Exit the King by Etat Libre d'Orange in its muskiness. An interesting option for a woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2362787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2362787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361805" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Josephanie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2337515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2337515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Josephanie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2337515">Josephanie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 07:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is quite harsh and overpowering, lacking the soft, subtle vibe typically associated with the clean girl aesthetic. It leans much heavier compared to other clean, musky perfumes Ive tried. Unfortunately, it gave me nausea and a headache, making it unsuitable for workplace wear. The fragrance comes across as overly sharp and synthetic. I wouldnt recommend blind-buying a full bottle, especially if youre a fan of lighter, cleaner scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2361805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2361805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bree.sxde@gmail.com"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272163"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2272163.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bree.sxde@gmail.com" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272163"><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="15776770703b666d7170557278747c793b767a78">[email&#160;protected]</a></b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked this fragrance for a day until I realized it smelled like grape medicine, just like Love, Don't Be Shy by Kilian except I hated that one immediately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2361632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2361632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360433" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sezbez124"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1949379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sezbez124" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Christian-Siriano/Intimate-Silhouette-52437.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52437.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intimate Silhouette"title="Intimate Silhouette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949379">sezbez124</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 23:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If 'soft girl' was a perfume, this would 100% be it! It's so hard to describe exactly how it smells, but the citruses/white florals and the MUSK are most prominent. This is a very musky perfume, particularly in the dry down, but it's one that evokes a feeling of comfort and freshness. I can see where some people come from in saying that it's 'screechy', but as a white floral enjoyer, I have never known a perfume to smell that way. So maybe if white florals have previously betrayed you in the past, this may be a miss. But for me, this is a signature scent worthy fragrance that makes me feel so comfy and confident. It's just pretty </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2360433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2360433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359056" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachpetals"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachpetals" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333988">peachpetals</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is an absolute DREAM. Soft, clean, gentle and floral musk - yet packs a punch and is incredibly strong. This will genuinely get you compliments. This perfume makes me feel GROWN, its so well blended and smells so expensive and sophisticated. It also takes you on a journey throughout the day, starting off on first spritz with a almost peppery citrus blast which dries down to a musky, dreamy, fluffy scent which richens into a deeper floral woody scent. Its simply STUNNING. This perfume is suitable for any woman 25+ and works in all seasons. <br />
<br />
This is not your typical sickly sweet vanilla flower bomb which is currently dominating modern perfumery, this is so fresh and modern - utterly signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2359056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2359056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tirizarry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1625683.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tirizarry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Dear-Polly-30928.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30928.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dear Polly"title="Dear Polly"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625683">tirizarry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Valaya is my #1 compliment getter. I dont know why but this thing is a beast on me and smells so much better on my skin that at first smell from a blot. I see many negative comments on how screechy it is, but I find it to be beautifully balanced, powerful, feminine, clean, fresh, floral musky. Amazing longevity (even staying on your hair and clothes until the next day!) and projection (going from the amount of comments I get while wearing it (even after a couple of hours)). My favorite by far from Parfum de Marly and on my favorite shelf forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2358798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2358798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462158">rea.cb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 14:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a little disappointed by this one, I ordered a sample after seeing people online rave about it being a very clean, fresh, fruity, musky scent. But all I really get is sweet white florals, that's basically all I get and it's a bit headache inducing. It smells exactly like Ex Nihilo Fleur Narcotique to my nose as well, but maybe my nose isn't sophisticated enough to pick up on other notes lol. Unfortunately this did not live up to my expectations when I saw the notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2353337"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2353337#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babyseagull"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2303504"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2303504.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babyseagull" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2303504">babyseagull</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent opening is beautiful and bright with citrus, and it turns into a really clean white floral with soap on dry down. HOWEVER, holy shit does this stick to every cloth surface I even glance at while wearing it and hover in the air for days, even with the smallest of sprays. It gave my boyfriend a headache and didn't come out of a jacket I wore even after going through our washing machine.<br />
<br />
If you absolutely love the scent/are not prone to headaches from white florals this is probably fantastic for you. But for me, it's banned from our house purely based on its stickiness to fabric!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2352991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2352991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352825" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sambolinasam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sambolinasam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352825ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352825" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674600">Sambolinasam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know what Aldehydes are, or how they smell, I assume something chemical, because that is how this perfume smells to me.  I don't get any vanilla, definitely some musk, but I am not getting the clean smell others are.  This is all v meh to me.  I had a sample, so will not be buying a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2352825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2352825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351193" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Autumnal Elf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Autumnal Elf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Volutes-Eau-de-Parfum-49101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Volutes Eau de Parfum"title="Volutes Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596">Autumnal Elf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Valaya is essentially the framework of Delina, sans the roses plus tang of lychee/rhubarb which makes it "Delina". Valaya is simply the musks, the citrus, &amp; especially the florals (except, obviously, rose), with additional bright aldehydes and a subjective accord of peach. Fresh and airy, while being strong and noticeable. Clean without being too laundry. Personally I do not get any woodiness, nor vanilla, in Valaya. She's supremely feminine. White is the perfect bottle color to represent this fragrance.<br />
<br />
If you are searching for a high quality "fresh fruity floral" that is definitely more floral than fruity, without patchouli or amber, something that is so clean, girly and playful, but noticeable and long lasting, look no further than Valaya. This is simply a beautiful, flowery floral with year round appeal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2351193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2351193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347043" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="janelrachel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568432"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1568432.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="janelrachel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568432">janelrachel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Valaya is a confident, elegant, fruity floral that at first spray, you're introduced with a sparkly peachy citrus with a fruity Skittle candy-like burst. At first spray I thought "childish for the mature price tag!". I walked away with 50 wrist sniffs over the next hour. Every 5-10 minutes that passed I liked it more and more. Like became "I might love this!" an hour later to "click to purchase" 6 hours later. Once the aldehyde and the playful fruity citrus screech combo quieted down, it had my attention.  <br />
<br />
This says hello with a zesty floral sharpness but holds hand with floral note freshness, rounded and grounded with a middle note, Nympheal, a "green" Mahonia, and orange blossom that take the back seat but is just visible enough in the rear view mirror. The fuzzy peach takes a few steps back on the dry down allowing the creamy and fresh cut green inching up front.<br />
<br />
Behold the base notes that gives allows for youthful but mature femininity! Ambroxan specifically, is a boss in my opinion, to warm and grow up the fizzy fruity, citrus, soapy, floral notes, and tame that wonderful but easily under/overused top note Aldehyde. With some staying subtle peach, citrus and florals, the perfumer Quentin Bisch couldn't have balanced Valaya better by crafting the perfect dose of the velvety, powdery, amber, woody, creamy Ambroxan w/vanilla alongside the vibrants making it a supreme day OR nighttime scent! I give much respect Valaya's longevity and sillage thanks to a newer note to the fragrance world, Akigalawood.This gem right here further finishes V's dry down by enveloping the upper notes with almost non detectable peppery spice with deep rich floral tones categorizing Valaya as a niche fragrance.<br />
<br />
This sillage moderate, it doesn't smack my coworkers or patients in their faces but it IS noticed in the best way. Wrist and clothing sprays last a solid 10-12 hours with some weakening during that time.15 hours later I can still smell it moderately on my wrists which is more than I can say for most of my reasonable and overpriced fragrances and makes up for the steep price tag. <br />
<br />
Happy sniffing :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2347043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2347043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345635" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vintila R."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vintila R." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569">Vintila R.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 14:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beyond my "love at first sniff" experiences I think  I get to know what fragrances I truly love by how fast I finish my bottles. I basically drank my 10 ml. decant of Valaya and can't stop thinking about getting a full bottle. When I read some of the reviews I feel like I'm smelling a different perfume because I don't get a heavy Ambroxan at all (this is nothing like Another 13 or similar "molecular" fragrances). The opening is citrusy and uplifting, I get mostly limes. The dry-down... is heavenly: a creamy peach predominates on my skin, it melts with a clean musk and some floral touches. It's not powdery. Based on my description, I know it might sound generic but it's not forgettable. This is a clean and ethereal perfume; somehow delicate, somehow carefree, like a beautiful woman who is not completely self-aware of her beauty. I can't say is just pleasing, to me this is intoxicating, even aphrodisiac. Lasts all day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2345635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2345635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345350" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrose15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381963"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381963.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrose15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381963">mrose15</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, I bought a sample of this and immediately got a bigger sample. Yup - its LOVE! I just purchased an actual bottle of this. There is something magical about this perfume. When I wear it, I feel like I am walking thru a secret garden filled with mysterious scents of peach, musk, citrus and vanilla. I always buy a sample first, as there are so many perfumes out there that just don't work for me.  A lot of the "popular scents" - Delina, Matcha Meditation, Libre, Another 13... they all smell awful on me - some like pencil shavings and playdough...This makes me feel special -whether I get compliments or not. Isn't that what perfume is all about? ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2345350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2345350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341677" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Danielle24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Danielle24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104326">Danielle24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 01:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample and I am so disappointed. I actually hate it. When I took my first sniff it immediately took me back to my teenage/early 20s tanning bed days. It smells exactly like my skin used to smell after tanning when you are warm, slightly sweaty, mixed with the smell of the remaining, heated indoor tanning lotion and the sterile smell of the room from the cleaning of the beds. I dont see what people see in this fragrance.<br />
<br />
<br />
Edit: Im coming back here on the 29th for an update because I now live this fragrance?! Im not sure how this happened but suddenly it changed for me and now its just a lovely soft citrus and musk. I ended up buying a bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2341677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2341677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333953" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KristinaAlexis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KristinaAlexis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111820">KristinaAlexis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled this on a lovely lady and ran behind her to ask her if what smelled so good. One of the most gorgeous fragrances I have ever smelled this is up there with safari and poeme! I forgive Bisch for the nightmare of delina...this is so damn gorgeous 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2333953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2333953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julianiperez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462598.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julianiperez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/iPiccirilli/Jasmilk-97047.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97047.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasmilk"title="Jasmilk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462598">Julianiperez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree w/ Mimi , once I smelled delina I was like .. this is what ppl going crazy about? Super underwhelmed and would never wear it myself but it could also b because I hate rose forward perfumes . Cus the rose always tends to smell like rose water to me its never like a creamy rose or realistic rose , dont get me wrong there are some gorgeous frags i absolutely love and they have rose notes but the rose in delina are just . Meh. I say this to say it turned me off to frags by this brand but valaya ignited my interest back on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2330058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2330058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julianiperez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462598.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julianiperez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/iPiccirilli/Jasmilk-97047.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97047.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasmilk"title="Jasmilk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462598">Julianiperez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now me personally Im a gourmand girl thru &amp; thru , love me an oriental vanilla love single note fragrances that contain amber so this kind of fragrance looking at the notes I wouldnt typically go for. But GUUUURL LEMME TELL YOU! I was getting my lashes done the other day and everytime my tech came close I got whiffs of this clean yet sweet and cozy and very unique fragrance , never smelled anything like it but I was intoxicated by it so Ofcourse I asked her what she had on &amp; it was actually a dupe for this perfume by Sugar works bath and body called Pink Valaya , idc it smelled damn delicious , got home and looked up the original to see the notes and I was real surprised cus if I wouldve read the notes first i probably wouldnt have gave it a chance so Im so happy I smelled it first well the dupe . Anyways Ill be ordering a sample of the original &amp; see if it matches up . I want my laundry to smell like this , I want my hair to smell like this , I want to bathe in this , it smells like an expensive luxurious fresh laundry with some sweetness a touch of woodyness and yet cozy , it gives off that fresh out the dryer warm clothes you cuddle up in and is the best feeling ever .. yeah. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2330054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2330054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very Hitchcock blonde/Sharon Stone in Basic Instinct.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2322848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2322848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322459" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lovescents748"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2154899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lovescents748" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2154899">Lovescents748</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 02:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the hair mist. It opens beautifully but within 10 minutes it dries to a very peppery harsh and sharp smell that lasts on my skin or hair for eternity or longer. Im not sure if this is just the hair mist thats this harsh?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2322459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2322459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321070" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumelover357"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2051078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumelover357" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051078">perfumelover357</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 14:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally hate musky, fresh, citrusy scents, but this one is my current favorite. The opening is indeed harsh and seems too much, but i don't mind it since it settles into a very airy, breezy scent that lasts several days. Longevity and projection are beast mode. I mostly smell musk and bergamot on my skin, not so much peach or vanilla and it stays quite linear. Great for all season and any occasion. Definitely not a safe blind buy and definitely way overpriced. Will i buy this again? Most probably. Is it worth the price? No. Is it an amazing fresh airy breezy fragrance? Yes. I have yet to find a dupe that comes close to valaya. Bonus points for the name :D</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2321070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2321070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lopatko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lopatko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279663">Lopatko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has a very harsh - even unpleasant note. Very off putting. Not at all as described (fresh and fruity). Instant headache. Not a good blind buy based on description.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2320651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2320651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318674" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Haya215"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464638"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Haya215" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464638">Haya215</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First spray: oh my gosh Another 13????<br />
1 minute later: oh, I can smell vanilla but still too much of A13<br />
30 minutes later: ok, too expensive, not worth the hype, nothing impressive, too A13 (which I personally hate!)<br />
Blind buy 10ml and will not purchase again. Enough for perfume gambling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2318674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2318674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316677" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Milk-67819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful sundress fragrance for the girl who wears a ribbon in her hair just because. <br />
<br />
Its every video made with that TikTok sound, Oh, how I love being a woman! The femininity is not naive, necessarily, but a deep embrace of girl-ness. This is two showers a day, hair sparkling clean, skin scrubbed within an inch of its life being smothered in scented lotion. Its light and beautiful and very much not me, though I admire its uhhh energy for that kind of shit. <br />
<br />
That said, I like this more than I thought I would after trying Delina. Definitely a scent for spring and summer with the strong citrus notes. This has a couple levels to it, which is satisfying, while still being a veritable fruit salad of scents. Sweet, but not tooth-achingly so. <br />
<br />
The perfect picnic in the park daytime date fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2316677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2316677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315860" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elle3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2262358.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elle3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Merchant-of-Venice/Andalusian-Soul-51393.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51393.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Andalusian Soul"title="Andalusian Soul"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262358">Elle3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Valaya is a clean, crisp, citrus, semi-musk pretty perfume. Do I like it? Well, kinda. I'm a gourmand girly; so this was a bit of a stretch for me. The perfume opens with citrus and dries down to the smell of fresh laundry. I do like it - somewhat. I liked it more when I layered it with Sweet by Brooklyn Ellis. Also, layered it with Fleur Narcotique. I got the mini travel-sized bottle. Would I repurchase this perfume? A bit on the fence. Not a hard yes, but not a hard no.  I may try Meloria next.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2315860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2315860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
