It lasts forever on my skin. The distant whiffs are gorgeous, but being up close to it is too much. I did scrub it off. And Ill still use my sample. Its complicated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2314672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2314672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314361" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iamposhy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2139006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iamposhy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139006">iamposhy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wearing Valaya since it was released, and I love it. However, not enough people talk about the vetiver note that masquerades as pepper, especially in high heat! While the notes sound like summer, I actually love this during the cooler monthsin warm temperatures, it can be stuffy and stagnate and will stick to you like glue, so there is no need to overspray.<br />
<br />
Also, I don't get Fleur Narcotique at all. I actually blind-bought FN when I ran out of V because of the comments here; they are nothing alike.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2314361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2314361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310982" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BerryBizarre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111839"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BerryBizarre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310982ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310982" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111839">BerryBizarre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Theres something about this perfume... I dont know what it is, but to my nose, its so sharp, screechy, and astringent. Far from an angel wrapped in soft, white linens, its more like a screechy harpy with talons. BUT, despite my personal feelings about this feisty creature, she somehow gets compliments. A lot of compliments. I dont understand how.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2310982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2310982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EmmaMartha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506352"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506352.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EmmaMartha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aerin/Cedar-Violet-68959.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68959.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedar Violet"title="Cedar Violet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506352">EmmaMartha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cant afford to love it but I do! <br />
This is like being wrapped up in a soft blanket fresh out of the drier. Its clean, fresh, a little citrusy but its just done so well. <br />
<br />
I regret trying it because now Ive got to save up 250 for a bottle. If you can afford it and like clean scents then dont walk, run as fast as you can and buy this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2305091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2305091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I feel like it burns my nose. I don't know what it is about it but it smells like pepper on me (which is not bad in itself) but it doesn't change at all throughout the day. I don't smell citrus, vetiver musk... Nothing but pepper <br />
<br />
It is long lasting (12 hours) so you are definitely going to get your money worth IF it ' s compatible with your skin chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I chose this one as my first niche perfume because it is long lasting, has a great sillage and has a very pretty bottle. And it is really diffrent from other perfumes in the market. I could picture a man wearing this but I think it leans more on the feminine side. Very bright aldehydes with sweet fruity undertones. Perfect for "clean girl aesthetic".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2303853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2303853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296823" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SaraDanielsson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1421474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SaraDanielsson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Black-Magenta-90712.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90712.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Magenta"title="Black Magenta"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296823ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296823" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421474">SaraDanielsson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful!! Gentle, glowy and faintly peach-y. Fresh and soft laundry. Delicate and totally radiant. Valaya does have a sharp and stingy effect after immediately being sprayed, but that fades for me really quickly. She lasts forever. But I dont think this was a great layer with Delina exclusif, the two dont play well together on me. I love them both (might still love Miss DE a liiiittle more, but she doesnt have the performance that Valaya has!) This is a really lovely perfume and sailing to the top of my want list!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2296823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2296823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296515" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Erika.Lane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Erika.Lane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723867">Erika.Lane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 00:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The aldehydes are SO hard for me  I love the peach and akigalawood together, but I would much rather go for blue talisman by ex nihilo. All the goodness of this but no aldehydes, maybe a bit more unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2296515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2296515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296193" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MBeas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MBeas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-75668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe"title="Prada Paradoxe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048208">MBeas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like clean cotton sheets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2296193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2296193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="valkyriee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2053372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2053372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="valkyriee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2053372">valkyriee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Currently this one is my go-to, layered with other perfumes.<br />
<br />
I absolutely hated Valaya when I tried it many months ago, because when I ordered a sample and sprayed it on paper, I felt like the smell was choking me. It was too much and too empty at the same time. Very clean, maybe even too clean? It was stuck in my nose even after I put the test strip away. It was this strong .. knowing that some scents smell different on skin than on paper, I tried it - still not much better. Softer maybe but still not a like. I didn't get it at all. Usually I love all clean, musky, floral, woody perfumes but that seemed to be a chemical mess of something. I thought the aldehydes may have been my problem with Valaya.<br />
<br />
I gave it another chance months later, and all I can say is - I like it a lot! It seems more toned down now, more softer, more smoother than in the beginning. While it was projecting like crazy in the beginning when I tried this, I felt like months later the projection was so much softer as well. <br />
The musk in PdM perfumes dry down so nicely. I think this is what makes me end up liking them so much.<br />
Sometimes I still feel like Valaya is lacking something but I do definitely understand now why people like it so much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2295598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2295598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294071" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaktus.krysia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaktus.krysia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265593">kaktus.krysia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 17:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The travel bottle is very handy. That's why I often bring it to holiday. And so far it has always been a mistake. The soapy aldehydes together with the incredibly artificial peach give me absolutly horrible headaches. It smells like the cheap ring-sized and rock hard peach jellies you can buy in the tourist-trappy candy stores.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2294071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2294071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293895" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dee97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dee97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130719">Dee97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The people werent lying when they said this is a compliment getter. I literally got stopped on the street today (I didnt know this actually happens) by a man saying to me and my friend one of you smells good and my friend immediately pointed to me. He asked me to show him the perfume and he took a picture of it from my phone. On the same day, another friend told me I smell really good. I only got it yesterday and I was wondering whether I made the right choice but the compliments have reassured me lol. Its a bit sharp at first, but when it settles, its the most beautiful, classy and clean scent. Id say you can wear it all year round but I think it would really shine in the spring. Also I think this would make a perfect bridal scent because its so clean and elegant at the same time without being old fashioned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TKqc123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TKqc123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200883">TKqc123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With just 2 sprays to the back of my wrist this gave me an immediate headache. I feel the fragrance is overly sweet &amp; old fashioned. I cannot speak to the notes because I tried to avoid spelling it.  The smell remained even after washing my arm &amp; using hand sanitizer. I had to put a layer of vaseline on top and that finally did the trick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2291626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2291626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289894" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrsbrittneyolson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2236912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrsbrittneyolson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289894ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289894" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2236912">mrsbrittneyolson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 18:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one so much!! So many of the reviews below describe Valaya as a heavenly angels scent. That is such a precise visual for me. She smells like the prettiest, softest, most-powdery, sweet, clean, shower skin you could ever inhale mixed with fluffy, plush, white wings. I noticed quite a few people said they did not get the vanilla or musk, but those notes and the ambroxan pull the most on my skin. Valaya is very sexy and incredibly long lasting, and every time I wear it men and women chase me around to ask what Im wearing.  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2289894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2289894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288498" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sharon McAlpine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sharon McAlpine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259694">Sharon McAlpine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 14:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is not for me. I find it quite sickly. I get a smell of white pepper and sweetness. I love musk and cannot smell any musk or vanilla here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2288498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2288498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286313" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="waskotransportation"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1145607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="waskotransportation" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Sunflowers-1701.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1701.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunflowers"title="Sunflowers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145607">waskotransportation</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 17:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I collect perfume and don't really have a specific style. I tend to like clean smelling fragrances More than others, but I have a very wide range of favorites. First, I'd like to say that this particular brand is my all-time favorite. I have nine of their collection and love them all and that has never happened. I've never found one perfume house that I basically love everything that they create. That is definitely the case with this brand. <br />
As soon as this came out I immediately bought it and it has risen to the number one spot in my collection over 300 or 400. Other great fragrances in my wide-ranging collection. <br />
<br />
The smell of this is addicting and I reach for this all the time. It's something that I never get tired of smelling. I don't know how to give a review based on notes and all of that, but I want to say that this is the most clean, fresh, and long-lasting fragrance in the fresh category that I've ever tried in my life. It is beautiful and I can't imagine anyone disliking this. It is perfection. <br />
In fact, just bought their new release in the purple bottle. I can't remember the name of it, but I immediately bought that and it arrived today. It's pretty great but not even half as great as this one. I'm kind of thinking I should have just bought a backup bottle of this instead for all that money. <br />
This is unimaginably stunning and something I don't think I can live without having in my collection. I know this is really over the top but I'm going to say I don't think I've ever even smelled any perfume in my life of 55 years. That is better than this. It just is too good to be true.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2286313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2286313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285897" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heather Pine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252304.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heather Pine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252304">Heather Pine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean "It Girl" scent alert!  I wanted to hate this fragrance because of the seriously unappealing price tag , but then a girl at Saks Fifth Avenue sprayed it on a card, and after one whiff, I was like Damn, I wanna smell like this!  Its giving that girl energyfresh, chic, effortless. A scent you dont want to admit you love but cant resist. It has a clean, polished vibe that makes you feel like you just walked out of a high-end boutique. Aldehydes galore! This scent is very aldehydic, with that unmistakable crispness . The ambroxan adds a soft, skin-like quality, making it feel like a personal, close-to-the-body fragrance. Unfortunately, it doesnt have much staying powerfades pretty quickly on the skin, which is a bit of a letdown for something that starts off so sharp and distinct. Its got that bright, fizzy pop just like when Sprites carbonation hits your nose ! Theres this zesty, citrus zing that makes it feel super fresh and uplifting, like laundry swaying in the breeze on a sunny day . Its crisp, clean, and airy, with that burst of citrus keeping it lively.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2285897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2285897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044041">EP712</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 13:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Follow https://www.instagram.com/ep_frags/ for more reviews <br />
<br />
Instagram: ep_frags<br />
<br />
10/10, long lasting, insane projection <br />
<br />
 Valaya is very clean, musky, citrusy fragrance and it leans on the feminine side. The aldehydes in it makes it very complex scent and difficult to describe it. It is very long lasting and has a strong sillage and projection. It is definitely in my top 10 and in my opinion its an any weather scent. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2283867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2283867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maelsmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maelsmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813481">Maelsmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 23:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, sexy, clean and strong. That feeling when I take a shower and put this perfume on - I would eat myself :)<br />
Definitely one of the top 3 perfumes in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2281089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2281089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280948" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280948" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="verzosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.239364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="verzosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Galop-d-Hermes-39584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Galop d'Hermes"title="Galop d'Hermes"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364">verzosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 19:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, it's actually not screechy at all and I find the opening quite pleasant, it starts a beautiful blend of aldehydes and white flowers. It smells like expensive soap before it bubbles up from getting wet. However, in the dry down there is a familiar sourness associated with this fragrance and some of the other flankers. I'm not saying sour is always a bad trait, but for a fresh fragrance I don't think it meshes well with me. Unfortunately, it is this trait that ruins it for me and has me taking my hands out of my pocket.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2280948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2280948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I dont notice any particular notes. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241437">Earthtoerykah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I completely understand the hype, but this scent is not for me. It is musky and flowery, with a perfect touch of sweetness. The floral notes are too strong for me and I felt the scent screeching at my nose all day. It lasts almost too long, I dropped a piece of paper that I used to test on my couch and I can still smell it days later. I can imagine spelling this on someone else and loving it, but for me this is a momentary admiration and not something that I want to experience for 8+ hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is such a beautiful fragrance that LASTS and projects well for hours. It's fresh and musky, and smells like fresh laundry. It's easily my biggest compliment getter from men and women alike. Just yesterday a stranger asked me what I was wearing and to write it down for her. While it's a perfect fragrance for spring/summer, I think it's musky enough for it to wear into fall/winter as a year round scent. It's fresh, relatively inoffensive, and a huge compliment getter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2278156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2278156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is going back to the store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2272604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2272604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kencalsuda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2108569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kencalsuda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Cassili-54660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cassili"title="Cassili"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108569">Kencalsuda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its fleur narcotique plus narciso poudree  it literally has over 12+ longevity on my skin, not to mention it was only one spray and i washed the area with just water. Not a groundbreaking scent but the performance and the overall quality makes it worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2271452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2271452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frantonin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213549.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frantonin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213549">Frantonin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 15:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found it to be a delicate, fresh perfume, perfect for any time of day or for spring and summer nights. It is a very pleasant perfume but not at all musky.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2269398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2269398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263610" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ville I"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2235353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ville I" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235353">Ville I</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the scent that made me fall in love with perfumery. I cant wear it myself since I am a man, but I do love smelling it. It is not "top 10 sexiest" or any of that crap, it is just heavenly and beautiful.<br />
<br />
The only problem I have is the performance, because it just wont stop performing. One spray on a tester and the whole house smells like Valaya for the rest of the day. I cant smell it on the same day that I want to enjoy other scents since all I can smell is Valaya after I spray it. Strangely i dont get any kind of nose-blindness with this scent like I do with others, it just keeps going.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2263610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2263610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263325" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SoheePark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.924022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SoheePark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-BO/Bombon-92543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombon"title="Bombon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263325ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263325" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022">SoheePark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 01:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought a travel size of this in winter and my first impression was: this smells like expensive furniture; an intriguing scent but not what i would personally wear.<br />
Fast forward to summer and this smells completely different to me; the aldehydes are not as sharp and harsh as before, and the citruses become more noticeable.<br />
This is definitely a clean girl perfume and I am surprised to see nobody compares it to Fleur Narcotique!! They are extremely similar except Fleur Narcotique is a tad more juicy. Nonetheless both are very airy, musky, clean girl perfumes.<br />
EDIT: guys, they were created by the same perfumer!! I swear they are 90% similar, with the exception that Fleur Narcotique has peony.<br />
If you have FN you dont need this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2263325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2263325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cavewomanbrain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2086248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cavewomanbrain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); The aldehydes and citrus completely take over on my skin, and it never settles into anything else. Do not blind buy this, especially if you don't like aldehydes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2263175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2263175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263074" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudegetsmoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2071768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudegetsmoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Afternoon-Swim-53947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afternoon Swim "title="Afternoon Swim "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768">dudegetsmoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff makes me nostalgic idk why. Smells like when my mom used to hold sing lullabies to me as a kid, and my face is half buried in the duvet.<br />
<br />
I'm a guy, but had to cop a bottle of this stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2263074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2263074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Poudre-d-Or-48660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poudre d'Or"title="Poudre d'Or"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this blindly with the expectation that it would be musky, powdery and creamy, but it was too fresh for me. As a fan of Delina Exclusif; this is also Quentin Bisch's creation. I appreciate it, but Valaya won't be one of my favourites.<br />
<br />
<br />
Edit:<br />
It has been a week, I have begun to love. It is very pure and clean. My partner says it is very masculine but imo it is quite feminine.<br />
<br />
Edit2:<br />
It has been a month;<br />
It is too sharp, synthetic and now I am sure I hate something in it. Maybe ambroxan, maybe nympheal thing that I am not familiar with..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2262363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2262363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259590" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hillamanne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hillamanne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907414">hillamanne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm posting the same review here as I did for Mystique Bouquet, a perfume heavily inspired by Valaya (some would call it a dupe). I got Mystique Bouquet and had a chance to compare it to Valaya on skin. MB has been maturing for about a month now and its been getting better all this time.<br />
<br />
They are very similar. Overall, Valaya comes across as more refined and smooth. The fruitiness in the opening subsides faster and youre left with a beautiful, long lasting musk. MB is fruitier (more citrusy) and sweeter, and these last into the mids. The deep drydown is quite similar, but MB is still a bit sweeter. Valaya lasts much longer on skin, although with some more maturation MB might improve its performance. The drydown of Valaya has a bit of ambroxan that I dont detect in MB (though I know it's there in the notes too). Also theres a bit of woodiness in Valaya, I guess from the akigalawood thats missing in MB. <br />
<br />
Both are very pretty, feminine and give a beautiful musky drydown. Theyre giving a clean feeling without being at all soapy or detergent-like. <br />
<br />
To me, Valaya is a bit more smooth and refined and I appreciate the performance. However, I like that MB is a little bit fresher and sweeter, and the price-quality-ratio of MB is unbeatable. Its not Valaya but it has a very similar feel, and personally, Im not so into the DNA that Id want to invest in Valaya at the moment. Ill keep enjoying MB, which I will happily overspray and refresh, considering the price tag it has.<br />
<br />
Edit: Valaya has a very persistant woodiness that lingers even after everything else is gone. Clearly detectable at the 10 h mark on skin, and I don't like it. I'd rather it just disappear completely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78574"comment_id="2259590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html?ccid=2259590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
